title: 101 Things to Do On a Date
creator: Top Free Games

extendedInfo.description: Have you ever gone to a dinner and a movie on a date only because nothing else came to mind?101 Things to Do on a Dateâ¦Besides Dinner and a Movie solves this problem.  The book offers 101 dating ideas to help get the fork out of your hand and popcorn out of your mouth.  Each date entry provides the following:--A humorous description of the dating activity,--An evaluation of the pros and cons specific to each date, --An estimated cost of the date,--A rating on whether it would be a good first date, and--A rating of how intimate the date will likely be.

reviews.comment: No indexing, no ability to search, no bookmarking, or any features... just one long book. Good info, disappointing app.
reviews.author: A Google User
